content: @T-lang is currently discussing moving the Monday triage meeting to Tuesday. We have a Doodle poll open at https://doodle.com/poll/vgv74x3d6g6khw5a . We'd also like to get input from other folks who have been regularly attending the meeting; please feel free to fill out the poll even if you're not a lang team member.
filled out -- fwiw tues/thursday evening just don't work well for me (I have classes all evening)
What time zone are you in again?

Same as Niko, Eastern time (EST I think? Not sure, maybe EDT right now). My schedule will change in a month to much more flexible for December and then completely different for next year, so that's also a data point likely worth considering - I'm not sure if Felix also is likely to have different schedule in a week or two with new job.

(All that basically to say "maybe just wait a month if current situation is not horrible")
Ah, got it. So when you say "evening", you mean the last 2-3 times in the poll, which for eastern time would be in the evening?
And I'm seriously considering waiting at least until DST passes to avoid confusion and complication. ;)

Tuesday past 2pm ET will not work for me, as indicated in the poll :)

Yeah, waiting for DST (this weekend in the US, I believe) seems like a good idea
Yeah, I probably filled it out wrong for winter time.
I wouldn't be able to attend Tuesday, but I'd catch the YouTube videos of it
